This question is a part of The 5 lb. Book of GRE Practice Problems (2nd Ed.) - VERBAL
The distinction between architecture and the engineering professions that it resembles is that the former must consider (i) _________ as well as functionality, as clients often base their decisions more on the beauty of the project than its practicality.
Blank (i)
(A) insouciance
(B) utility
(C) price
(D) aesthetics
(E) profundity
Show
Hide
